entry.title: Beadery Holiday Ornament Kit Elegant Snowflake 7486
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Beadery
Type: Bead Ornament Kits
Price: 6.99

Beadery Holiday Ornament Kit Elegant Snowflake 7486

Makes 6 Ornaments

Decorate your home this holiday season with some of our fun to make Holiday Celebration™ ornament kits.

This do-it-yourself craft kit contains everything you need to make six 5.5″ (13.9 cm) snowflake ornaments that are ready to hang on your tree.

Kit contents:

  • high quality beads
  • chenille
  • easy to follow instructions

    Made in the USA
